author: sly_gryphon
content: Cross posting my question from the Phase 0 channel:   What is the best way to raise potential issues [with the spec] - just put up a pull request with changes, or raise an Issue in github, or just mention it here for a discussion?

author: protolambda
content: Issues or PRs, with more description, would be nice <@467641904247341067> , thank you üëç

author: sly_gryphon
content:
Done as issues. I'm happy to work on an actual PR after feedback if people think it is worth it.

The issues are relatively minor (i.e. nothing is broken), except for the current Dev branch changes to Store for block headers, but that is probably a work in progress (I didn't see a PR or branch, but someone may be working on it privately).
